### ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹


- `BuildImage`

```python
from nonebot_plugin_imageutils import BuildImage
```

- `Text2Image`

```python
from nonebot_plugin_imageutils import Text2Image

# img: PIL.Image.Image
img = Text2Image.from_text("@mnixry ðŸ¤—", 50).to_image()

# ä»¥ä¸Šç»“æžœä¸º PIL çš„ Image æ ¼å¼ï¼Œè‹¥è¦ç›´æŽ¥ MessageSegment å‘é€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è½¬ä¸º BytesIO
```

```python
from nonebot_plugin_imageutils import text2image

# ä»¥ä¸Šç»“æžœä¸º PIL çš„ Image æ ¼å¼ï¼Œè‹¥è¦ç›´æŽ¥ MessageSegment å‘é€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è½¬ä¸º BytesIO

```
